# BookedIn.ai - AI Lead Conversion Platform

> AI-powered lead conversion system that automates follow-ups and converts more leads into booked appointments

## What is BookedIn.ai?

BookedIn.ai is a lead conversion SaaS platform that helps businesses automatically follow up with leads and convert them into booked appointments. The platform uses AI to personalize outreach, automate follow-up sequences, and dramatically reduce no-show rates.

## Key Features

- **AI-Powered Follow-Ups**: Automatically send personalized follow-up messages to leads
- **Multi-Channel Outreach**: Email, SMS, and voice call automation
- **Smart Scheduling**: Intelligent appointment booking and calendar management
- **No-Show Reduction**: Automated reminders that cut no-shows by up to 83%
- **Lead Scoring**: AI-driven lead qualification and prioritization
- **CRM Integration**: Connects with popular CRM systems

## Pricing

### Platform Plan - $297/month
- Full platform access
- Unlimited leads
- AI-powered automation
- Multi-channel outreach
- Analytics dashboard

### Agency Plan - $497/month
- Everything in Platform
- White-label solution
- Client management
- Agency dashboard
- Priority support

### Done For You - $2,500 one-time
- Complete setup and configuration
- Custom automation workflows
- Training and onboarding
- 30-day support included

## Use Cases

- **Real Estate Agents**: Follow up with property inquiries automatically
- **Service Businesses**: Convert consultation requests into booked appointments
- **Coaches & Consultants**: Automate discovery call scheduling
- **Agencies**: Manage lead conversion for multiple clients
- **Sales Teams**: Never miss a follow-up opportunity

## Company Information

- **Website**: https://bookedin.ai
- **Product**: Lead conversion and appointment booking automation
- **Target Audience**: Service businesses, agencies, coaches, consultants, real estate agents
- **Founded**: 2024
- **Founder**: Samin Yasar

## Technical Details

- **Platform**: Next.js 15 with React
- **Hosting**: Railway
- **Analytics**: Google Analytics, PostHog, DataFast
- **Integration**: API-first architecture for easy CRM integration

## Contact

- **Dashboard**: https://dashboard.bookedin.ai
- **Support**: Available through platform
- **Demo Booking**: https://bookedin.ai/book
